page.title: 14COMMUNICATION,MEDIA & LAW
page.content: Law & Order:very little serious crime. Occasional burglaries,some petty pilfering.Community Policeman just appointed.He aims to familiarise himself with area & people & to gain trust from the community.He has arranged transport for teenagers to Crossways Youth Club. Communication,Media:T.V.channels are: T.V.South,T.V.SouthWest,BBC & ITV. National radio is received,also 2CR, the local station.National newspapers are delivered daily with a 4p surcharge.Local agents deliver the weekday Dorset Evening Echo,the weekly Western Gazette,free newspapers & Sunday papers.Noticeboards & post offices display news of village events.Broadmayne has an information leaflet for new residents.The church magazine;The Compass is delivered monthly.A library van comes every 2wks
